title: The Survived Alchemist With A Dream Of Quiet Town Life.

status: Ikinokori Renkinjutsushi wa Machi de Shizuka ni Kurashitai; Survived Alchemist With a Dream of Quiet Town Life; The Alchemist Who Survived Now Dreams of a Quiet City Life (Official English); The Last Alchemist Dreams of a Quiet Town Life; The Last Surviving Alchemist Wants to Live Quietly in the City; The Last Surviving Alchemist Who Wishes for a Quiet Town Life; The Survived Alchemist with a Dream of Quiet Town Life; 幸存炼金术师想在城里静静; 生き残り錬金術師は街で静かに暮らしたい; 生活生き残り錬金術師は街で静かに暮らしたい
description:
Description :
        After two hundred years, A young alchemist known as Marielle wakes from her slumber.

The Kingdom of Endarisa had been brought to ruin by the stampeding 'Forest of Demons.' Although Marielle managed to escape by using the power of 'Living Death,' she made a clumsy mistake,and ended up sleeping for two hundred years.

The age in which she awoke was a completely new world. Here alchemists were all but extinct and potions could only be afforded by the rich and powerful.

As a result, Marielle ended up being the only alchemist in the city. Despite this she still sets out to lead a quiet and leisurely life in this strange new world. Although it's two hundred years in the future, she'll still live life her own way.

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 5: A Song To Let Go
